author: sylvain
msg: - getValue() no more has the side effect of displaying validation errors, even if validation still occurs.
- validators are always called on validate() since validation may depend on other fields whose value may have changed since last validation.
Updated Union so that, when the case value changes, values entered for the previous case value are not lost.

author: sylvain
msg: Rhino with no source included, and jar containing the checkout timestamp
